TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IMethodReturnMessage implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodMessage

summary.span: 定义方法调用返回消息接口。

span.span: Defines the method call return message interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用返回消息表示对消息接收器末尾处的对象上的方法调用的响应。A method call return message represents the response to a method call on an object at the end of the message sink. 导致对远程对象，调用的方法生成并被用来返回结果的方法调用返回到调用方。An is generated as a result of a method called on a remote object, and is used to return the results of the method call back to the caller. ## Examples 下面的示例代码演示自定义代理该替代`RealProxy.Invoke`若要返回的消息信息写入控制台。The following example code shows a custom proxy that overrides `RealProxy.Invoke` in order to write the return message information to the console. [!code-cpp[IMethodReturnMessage_ReturnValue#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IMethodReturnMessage_ReturnValue/CPP/imethodreturnmessage_returnvalue.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IMethodReturnMessage_ReturnValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IMethodReturnMessage_ReturnValue/CS/imethodreturnmessage_returnvalue.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IMethodReturnMessage_ReturnValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IMethodReturnMessage_ReturnValue/VB/imethodreturnmessage_returnvalue.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public Exception Exception { get; }
.property instance class System.Exception Exception
Public ReadOnly Property Exception As Exception
public: property Exception ^ Exception { Exception ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取在方法调用期间引发的异常。

span.span: Gets the exception thrown during the method call.

value.span: 方法调用的异常对象；或者如果该方法未引发异常，则为 。

span.span: The exception object for the method call, or if the method did not throw an exception.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例代码演示自定义代理重写返回消息信息，包括是否方法引发了异常。The following example code shows a custom proxy that overrides RealProxy.Invoke in order to write the return message information, including whether the method threw an exception. [!code-cpp[IMethodReturnMessage_Exception#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IMethodReturnMessage_Exception/CPP/imethodreturnmessage_exception.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IMethodReturnMessage_Exception#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IMethodReturnMessage_Exception/CS/imethodreturnmessage_exception.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IMethodReturnMessage_Exception#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IMethodReturnMessage_Exception/VB/imethodreturnmessage_exception.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管属性是冗余的因为可以通过实现相同的功能字段和方法，可能有性能优化可用如果实施者理解时的所有自变量将检索。Although the property is redundant since the same functionality can be achieved through the field and method, there might be performance optimization available if the implementer understands when all the arguments will be retrieved. > [!WARNING] > 如果不`null`、时将引发异常访问。If is not `null`, a exception is thrown when is accessed. ## Examples [!code-cpp[IMethodReturnMessage_ReturnValue#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IMethodReturnMessage_ReturnValue/CPP/imethodreturnmessage_returnvalue.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[IMethodReturnMessage_ReturnValue#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IMethodReturnMessage_ReturnValue/CS/imethodreturnmessage_returnvalue.cs#2)] [!code-vb[IMethodReturnMessage_ReturnValue#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IMethodReturnMessage_ReturnValue/VB/imethodreturnmessage_returnvalue.vb#2)]
